name: My Little Petgun
description:
Plot

A game made for GMTK game jam with the theme Out Of Control!

You have a demonic weapon  that  impales the creatures  to use them  as weapons, however,  since  they don't  like  "being stabbed by butt-hole", the weapon  may often fails against your Nazi  zombies within the  trench's  maze

Controls:

  • AWSD to walk;
  • MOUSE to aim;
    • RMB aiming at creature to stab it and "equip" the  poor animal;
    • LMB  with  a  creature attached to the demonic gun  to fire it's magic attack;
